list.name: iam.serviceAccounts.actAs
list.reason: When deploying, act as the default service account, which will grant further permissions required during deployment.

list.name: run.operations.get
list.reason: Required during deployment to confirm that deployment was successful.

list.name: run.routes.invoke
list.reason: Invoke the deployed Cloud Run services to perform a render.

list.name: run.services.create
list.reason: Deploy new, and edit existing, Cloud Run services.

list.name: run.services.list
list.reason: Get a list of existing Cloud Run services, to ensure no unintended overwriting.

list.name: run.services.update
list.reason: Update a Cloud Run service, for example providing it with more memory or CPU.

list.name: storage.buckets.create
list.reason: Create the storage bucket to store the bundled site and render output.

list.name: storage.buckets.list
list.reason: Get a list of existing Cloud Storage resources, to ensure no unintended overwriting of storage buckets.

list.name: storage.objects.create
list.reason: Create new objects in storage. This could be bundled sites, or renders, or logs.

list.name: logging.logEntries.list
list.reason: Used by the CLI to fetch recent logs if the Cloud Run service crashes, to assist in debugging the root cause.
